cards.title: Banshee
powers: Select a non-hero target. Increase the next damage dealt to that target by 2.
incapacitatedAbilities: Destroy a target with 3 or fewer hp.

openingLines.default: Beware! I have swum in the river, and it dances to my tune!
openingLines.Cauldron.CeladrochCharacter: This land is for the living! Return to your kingdom below!
openingLines.TheDreamerCharacter: These dreams must also die. Let them fade.
openingLines.ArtifactComics.TombstoneCharacter: You're on the wrong side of the river. It's time to go home.

cards.title: Better Off Dead
body: When {Banshee} would be incapacitated, each player may first play a card.
powers: Draw a card. 1 incapacitated hero activates an ability. Then, if {Banshee} has 10 or fewer hp, you may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: I loved my life, but it is over. I am{BR}ready to move on to what's next. Promise{BR}me you won't won't let them bind me here.

cards.title: Bridge of the Broken
body: When this card enters play, return all of your other dirges in play to your hand.
Play this card next to a target. Damage dealt to that target is irreducible. The first time each turn that target deals damage, {Banshee} may use a power.
At the end of that target's turn, if this card did not enter play this turn, play up to 1 card and return this card to your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: So-called speaker, where{BR}is your power? What are your laments{BR}to Kalementu? The songs of the dead are ended. They are faded on the wind.

cards.title: Call of the Grave
body: Discard any number of cards.
{Banshee} deals herself 1 irreducible infernal damage for each card discarded this way.
{Banshee} deals a target X irreducible infernal damage, where X = 2 times the damage she took this way.

flavorQuotes.text: I cannot cross the river, but{BR}the ferryman knows my name.{BR}your passage is paid in full!

cards.title: Chorus of Chaos
body: When this card enters play, return all other dirges in play to your hand.
Play this card next to a target. The first time each turn another target is dealt damage by a non-hero card, that source deals that same damage to the target next to this card.
At the end of that target's turn, if this card did not enter play this turn, play up to 1 card and return this card to your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: Well, shoot! That wasn't{BR}supposed to happen...

cards.title: Decaying Tones
body: When a card is destroyed, you may draw a card.
At the start of your turn, {Banshee} regains 2 hp. Then destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Everything withers. I can{BR}hear the fading notes of each{BR}passing through the veil.

cards.title: Dread Cacophony
body: 1 target deals itself 1 irreducible infernal damage.
You may draw a card.
You may play a card.

cards.title: Dream Thief
body: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck, the villain deck, and the environment deck. You may put a card discarded this way into play from the trash.
You may draw or play a card.

cards.title: Fatal Fortissimo
body: Select up to 3 targets. Increase the next damage dealt to those targets by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: Is it bad that sounds beautiful to me?

cards.title: Grave Robber
body: Put a card other than a one-shot from a trash into play.

flavorQuotes.text: In life were you nothing{BR}but a thief; in death, you plunder{BR}the halls of the dead!

cards.title: Menacing Melody
powers: A target deals itself 0 irreducible infernal damage. Then, if that target has 3 or fewer hp, destroy it and {Banshee} regains X hp, where X = that target's hp before it was destroyed.
Select a keyword. Increase the next damage dealt to each target with that keyword by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: You swim in the whispers of Irkalla.{BR}Hear now the song of Ereshkigal!

cards.flavorReference: Banshee, Strange Stories: Dead Men's Tales

cards.title: Mournful Morendo
powers: Select an environment card. You may shuffle it into its deck. If you do, destroy this card. Otherwise, destroy the selected card.

flavorQuotes.text: What prison of earth can hold{BR}the forces of the dead?

cards.flavorReference: Banshee, Q is for Quiet one-shot

cards.title: Reaper's Rest
body: When this card enters play, you may draw and play a card.
At the end of each player's turn, if that player did not play a card, did not use a power, or did not draw a card this turn, select a target. Increase the next damage dealt to that target by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Your song ends while mine begins.{BR}I-- wipe that smirk off your face!

cards.flavorReference: [y=0.8]Beketamun, Guardians at the Gate: The Lost Pyramid

cards.title: Ruinous Rhythm
powers: Destroy a non-character, non-target card. If a non-ongoing is destroyed this way, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: It doesn't matter what form you{BR}take. Even dreams must die.

cards.title: Tension and Resolution
body: The first time each non-hero turn you play a card with a name not in play, you may draw a card and use a power.

flavorQuotes.text: In the music of the spheres{BR}above and the world below, there is an{BR}ebb and flow to all things.

cards.title: Verse for the Vanquished
body: When this card enters play, return all of your other dirges in play to your hand.
Play this card next to a target. The first time each turn that target is dealt damage, a player may discard a card to draw or play a card.
At the end of that target's turn, if this card did not enter play this turn, play up to 1 card and return this card to your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: This power is{BR}too great for you!
But I am not alone: Nagala's{BR}victims speak through me!

cards.title: Voice for the Voiceless
body: Search your deck for a dirge and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.
You may draw a card.
You may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Old, dark, enchanted{BR}forest, you have been silent long{BR}enough. The dead sing of your glory. Soon the living will know your song.

cards.title: Wretched Refrain
body: When this card enters play, return all of your other Dirges in play to your hand.
Play this card next to a target. When that target would be dealt damage, you may increase that damage by 1 and change the damage type to a type of your choice.
At the end of that target's turn, if this card did not enter play this turn, play up to 1 card and return this card to your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: The fell voice on the{BR}air. What does it mean?

cards.flavorReference: Through the Shadows: Paying the Ferryman
